list.name: SPRING-EJECTOR
list.description: Gale drops a bounce pad underfoot, launching friend and foe alike into the air.
list.descriptionHtml: Gale drops a bounce pad underfoot, launching friend and foe alike into the air.

list.name: TWISTER
list.description: Gale uses his leaf blower to create a local tornado, which will push away any opponents that try to pass through.
list.descriptionHtml: Gale uses his leaf blower to create a local tornado, which will push away any opponents that try to pass through.
